sqlMap.select: select idExpensesAgent, idJobSheet, idAgentFee, charge, kurs, description, kursValue, descriptionInvoice, oriKurs, oriWeight, isTax,isVat, totalTax, totalVat from expensesagent where idExpensesAgent = #idExpensesAgent#
select idExpensesAgent, idJobSheet, idAgentFee, charge, kurs, description, kursValue, descriptionInvoice, oriKurs, oriWeight, isTax, isVat, totalTax, totalVat from expensesagent

select ea.idExpensesAgent, ea.idJobSheet, ea.idAgentFee, ea.charge, ea.kurs, ea.description, af.aliasName, af.description as descriptionFee, ea.kursValue, ea.descriptionInvoice, ea.oriKurs, ea.oriWeight, ea.isTax, ea.isVat, ea.totalTax, ea.totalVat, af.category from expensesagent ea left join agentfee af on ea.idAgentFee = af.idAgentFee where ea.idJobSheet = #idJobSheet# order by ea.idExpensesAgent
select ifnull(sum(charge),0) as totalCharge from expensesagent where idJobSheet = #idJobSheet# and kurs = 'IDR'
select ifnull(sum(charge),0) as totalCharge from expensesagent where idJobSheet = #idJobSheet# and kurs = 'USD'

select ea.idExpensesAgent, ea.idJobSheet, ea.idAgentFee, ea.charge, ea.kurs, ea.description, af.aliasName, af.description as descriptionFee, ea.kursValue, ea.descriptionInvoice, ea.oriKurs, ea.oriWeight, ea.isTax, ea.isVat, ea.totalTax, ea.totalVat, af.category from expensesagent ea left join agentfee af on ea.idAgentFee = af.idAgentFee where ea.idJobSheet in ( select j.idJobSheet from jobsheet j where j.jobNo = #jobNo# ) order by ea.idExpensesAgent
sqlMap.insert: insert into expensesagent (idJobSheet, idAgentFee, charge, kurs, description, kursValue, descriptionInvoice, oriKurs, oriWeight, isTax, isVat, totalTax, totalVat) values (#idJobSheet:INTEGER#, #idAgentFee:INTEGER#, #charge:DOUBLE#, #kurs:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #kursValue:DOUBLE#, #descriptionInvoice:VARCHAR#, #oriKurs:DOUBLE#, #oriWeight:DOUBLE#, #isTax:INTEGER#, #isVat:INTEGER#, #totalTax:DOUBLE#, #totalVat:DOUBLE#)
sqlMap.update: update expensesagent set idJobSheet = #idJobSheet:INTEGER#, idAgentFee = #idAgentFee:INTEGER#, charge = #charge:DOUBLE#, kurs = #kurs:VARCHAR#, description = #description:VARCHAR#, kursValue = #kursValue:DOUBLE#, descriptionInvoice = #descriptionInvoice:VARCHAR#, oriKurs = #oriKurs:DOUBLE#, oriWeight = #oriWeight:DOUBLE#, isTax = #isTax:INTEGER#, isVat = #isVat:INTEGER#, totalTax = #totalTax:DOUBLE#, totalVat = #totalVat:DOUBLE# where idExpensesAgent = #idExpensesAgent#
